Improvements.Improvement: Use dependency injection for the server object
Improvements.Description: Instead of directly getting the server object within the constructor, it would be better to pass it as a parameter. This follows the Dependency Injection principle, making the code easier to test and maintain.

Improvements.Improvement: Refactor game rules initialization into a method
Improvements.Description: The constructor is doing too much work by initializing the game rules. This can be refactored into a separate method to make the constructor cleaner.
